banner.title: Transform your <highlight>body</highlight>, transform your <highlight>life</highlight>
banner.subtitle: Discover the power of smart, personalized fitness.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Provide a comprehensive physical and mental wellness service that combines technology, quality, and personalized attention, allowing users to access all VitalFit branches quickly and consistently, enhancing their experience through innovative digital tools.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become the most intelligent and integrated fitness ecosystem in the country, leading in technological innovation, customer retention, and sustainable franchise growth.

values.title: Values
values.content: Our operation is based on four fundamental values: Operational Coherence, which ensures standardization in every interaction; Data Integrity, as the foundation for strategic decision-making; Customer Orientation, focused on building long-term relationships; and Technological Agility, enabling us to continuously adapt to market demands.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.content: Transform lives through fitness by creating a community where everyone finds the motivation, equipment, and perfect environment to achieve their physical and mental goals. We are committed to being your ally on this journey of personal growth.

ServicesPage.title: <highlight>OUR</highlight> SERVICES
ServicesPage.subtitle: Explore the variety of classes we offer to help you reach your fitness goals.

BranchesPage.title: <highlight>OUR</highlight> <highlight-dark>LOCATIONS</highlight-dark>
BranchesPage.subtitle: Your fitness space, closer than you imagine. Our VITALFIT branches are strategically located to make training accessible, fast, and to ensure you never pause your well-being.
BranchesPage.footerQuote: Your best version starts here. Visit our branches and feel the energy that transforms. Every VITALFIT space is designed to inspire, challenge, and accompany you on every step of your evolution.

FindBranchPage.title: FIND YOUR BRANCH
FindBranchPage.description: Use the map or search bar to locate our branches.

successNotification.title: Check your email
